# oxc/number-arg-out-of-range

<div class="rule-meta">
<span class="default-on">
âœ… This rule is turned on by default.
</span>
</div>

### What it does

Checks whether the radix or precision arguments of number-related functions exceeds the limit.

### Example
```javascript
var x = 42;
var s_radix_64 = x.toString(64);
var s = x.toString(1);
```
